mapper.select: select bo.no, bo.title, us.name, bo.hit, to_char(bo.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, bo.user_no userNo from board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no order by bo.no desc
select bo.no, us.name, bo.hit, to_char(bo.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, bo.title, bo.content, bo.user_no userNo from board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no and bo.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values( seq_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo} )
